params._user: Address of the target to deploy staking contract for.

returns._0: address Address of the staking contract.
address Address of the staking ERC20 template to be used.
address Address of the staking registry contract.

params._rareStakingTemplate: Address of the staking ERC20 template.

params._stakingRegistry: Address of the new staking registry contract.

deployStaking(address).notice: Deploys a staking contract for the supplied target address. Reverts if address exists.

getRareStakingTemplateAddress().notice: Retrieve the currently template of the staking ERC20 contract.

getStakingRegistryAddress().notice: Retrieve the currently used staking registry address.

setRareStakingTemplate(address).notice: Set the rare staking ERC20 template address to be used.

setStakingRegistry(address).notice: Set the staking registry address field to be used.

documentation.text: @notice Emitted via {deployStaking} when a new staking contract is deployed.
@notice Emitted via {setRareStakingTemplate} when the staking template is updated.
@notice Emitted via {setStakingRegistry} when the staking registry is updated.
@notice Emitted when Zero address provided where it is not allowed.

@notice Set the staking registry address field to be used.
 @param _stakingRegistry Address of the new staking registry contract.

@notice Set the rare staking ERC20 template address to be used.
 @param _rareStakingTemplate Address of the staking ERC20 template.

@notice Retrieve the currently used staking registry address.
 @return address Address of the staking registry contract.

@notice Retrieve the currently template of the staking ERC20 contract.
 @return address Address of the staking ERC20 template to be used.
